content: no such thing as bad weather only bad clothes a close-fitting warm hat can make the worst winter weather feel like a walk in the park the purl ridges on this lushly textured hat knit with dense bulky yarn trap warmth and can keep your noggin toasty even in the depth of a cold snap size 21 5 / 54 5cm circumference unstretched green mountain spinnery limited edition merino bulky 112yrds/102m 4oz/113g 1 skein circular knitting needles sizes us 10½ and us 13 - 16 long double pointed kniign needles sizes us 10½ and us 13 gauge 10 sts per 4 / 10cm
